message.entry: Arguments must be 2-dimensional, or at least one argument must be scalar. Use TIMES (.*) for elementwise multiplication.
Missing value condition must be specified as ''omitnan'' or ''includenan''.
Invalid option. Option must be ''forward'', or ''reverse''.
Unable to perform assignment because right-hand side must be an Expression, or a double or logical array.
When the base is a matrix, the exponent must be a nonnegative integer scalar.
First input must be a vector.
Second input must be a positive real-valued scalar or 'inf'.
Syntax not supported. Only the dimension argument is supported when using Expression.
Syntax not supported. Only the dimension argument is supported when using Expression.
Derivative of gamma is only supported when gamma is called with a nonnegative input.
